items.title: The great software rewiring: AI isn’t just eating everything; it is everything
items.description: Gen AI is not just another technology layer; it has the potential to eat the entire software industry from the inside-out.

items.title: How Yelp reviewed competing LLMs for correctness, relevance and tone to develop its user-friendly AI assistant
items.description: Yelp found that when it first launched a GPT-4o-powered AI chatbot, usage rates dropped. But training it to sound like a human changed that.

items.title: Mayo Clinic’s secret weapon against AI hallucinations: Reverse RAG in action
items.description: To tackle data-retrieval-based hallucinations in non-diagnostic use cases, Mayo Clinic has applied CURE reverse RAG paired with vector databases.

items.title: Infinite Realms turns fantasy books into living, breathing game worlds with help of AI
items.description: Infinite Realms wants to turn beloved fantasy books with big followings into living, breathing game worlds.

items.title: Mistral releases new optical character recognition (OCR) API claiming top performance globally
items.description: Mistral AI enables businesses to extract, analyze and interact with their documents in more intelligent ways.
